divs: sighting detailsi was looking in the western part of the sky for meteorites and saw this triangle object very high up (miles). it had a faint rose color light at each point of the triangle object. while it was traveling from south west to north east at a speed much much faster than a jet an slower than a meteorite it turned bright white for a 1\2 to 1 second while traveling. the entire sighting was approx. 7 seconds and im guessing during this time it traveled a 1000 miles and disappeared when it travelled over the trees.
Summary: This Triangle object had 3 faint rose color lights at each point of the triangle that traveled very fast
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ringwood
There were no other sightings in Ringwood on or around August 14th 2013
